column1: '''''kesta''''' is a [[Quenya]] word meaning "to seek, search for".<ref>{{PE
column2: Eldarin}}, p. 156</ref> It has been suggested that the regularized spelling would be ''cesta-'' according to the Quenya of ''[[The Lord of the Rings]]''.<ref>Petri Tikka, "[http://www.petritikka.com/elvish/PE17.html Quenya words in Parma Eldalambaron 17]" at [http://www.petritikka.com/elvish/ Men Eldalambínen] (accessed 9 January 2010)</ref>
